price: Mu by’ukuri ibiri ku isi twabigize umutako wayo kugira ngo (abantu) tubagerageze, maze tugaragaze abarusha abandi gukora ibikorwa byiza.
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا مَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ زِينَةٗ لَّهَا لِنَبۡلُوَهُمۡ أَيُّهُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnā mā ʿalā al-arḍi zīnatan lahā linabluwahum ayyuhum aḥsanu ʿamalan
